summary: A police officer adopts the son and sole survivor of a family he has massacred while pursuing a terrorist. After some time the foster son finds out what the stepfather did.
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Hrithik Roshan|Preity Zinta|Sonali Kulkarni|Jackie Shroff|Puru Rajkumar|Abhay Chopra|Vineet Sharma|Rajendra Gupta|Memon Mohsin|Master Yogin Soni|Heenaa Biswas|Sanjeev Rattan|Manoj Mishra|Chandan Bisht|Ram Awana|Sanjeev Siddharth|Sandeep Mehta|Ashok Banthia|Shahid Khan|Masoo|Gopi Desai|Rajeev Saxena|Hena|Suchita Trivedi|Swarangi|Romi Siddique|Manav Kaushik|Rajesh Pandey|Sanjay Jha|Pramod Singh|Akash Salgotra|Adhir Bhat|Uday Chandra|Mushtaq Khan|Kumar Thakur|Hashim|Ihino|Rajendra Singh Negi|Amar|Alok Sharma|Prem Sagar Singh|Yash Kumar|Dixit Kaul|Uzafa Abbas|Khalid Siddiqui|Billal Jaan|Akbar Khan|Riyaz Merchant|Anu|Shyamsundar Kalani|Jaswir Kaur|Loy Mendonsa|Ehsaan Noorani
title: Mission Kashmir
